Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2008 07:24PM lukasmama wrote: Hi all.  I surely know what you guys are going through.  My first surgery was 2003 and was B9.  Then last October it all blew up.  It came back as stage 1 and took 3 surgeries with the last being a mastectomy to get rid of it all.  Life was just starting to get back to normal and not they are pretty sure the cancer is back and now in the other breast.  I had my core biopsies on friday. They did more than usual because of my history.  15 of them!!!!!!  I look like a pin cushion so not a happy girl.  I am going to the surgeon on Friday to discuss my options.  My personal decision this time is to go for the mastectomy right away cuz I cannot do 3 surgeries in 6 months again.  I hate the waiting game.  They did not do radiation last time so don't know about this time but I am ER+ so taking tamoxifan.
Posts.Title: HELP NEEDED...Microcalcifications- biopsy coming up busymomof4 leaf
